Lyrics: Pois tals saber mi sortz eﾂｷm creis
Poetic Translation: Since skill in me so springs and grows

Lyrics: Que trobar sai ・・ et ieu o dic! ・・
Poetic Translation: That I'm a poet (so I claim!),

Lyrics: Mal estara si non pareis
Direct Translation: See Leonardo Malcovati's work at Trobar.org.
Poetic Translation: Unless this verse my talent shows

Lyrics: Et er mi blasmat si m'en gic;
Poetic Translation: And I write well, I'll face the blame;

Lyrics: Car so qu'om van'ab la lenga
Poetic Translation: For, if bragging words I utter,

Lyrics: Taing ben que en pes lo tenga,
Poetic Translation: Thoughts of proof my mind encumber:

Lyrics: Car non pot aver pejor dec
Poetic Translation: For baseless bragging all decry

Lyrics: Qui ditz so que no s'avenga.
Poetic Translation: As a shameful, clumsy blunder.

Lyrics: Er ai gaug car sebram dels freis
Poetic Translation: I love that now we part with snows

Lyrics: E remanon sol li abric;
Poetic Translation: And leave the house for sport and game.

Lyrics: Li auzellet ・・ et es lor leis
Poetic Translation: The little birds, whose laws impose

Lyrics: Qe negus de chantar noﾂｷis gic ・・
Poetic Translation: That all must sing or bear the blame,

Lyrics: Us quecs s'alegr'en sa lenga
Poetic Translation: All in their own language utter

Lyrics: Pel novel temps queﾂｷil sovenga;
Poetic Translation: Joy, for each is Springtime's lover,

Lyrics: E dels arbres qu'eron tuit sec
Poetic Translation: And trees that once were brown and dry

Lyrics: Lo foils pels branquils s'arenga.
Poetic Translation: Waken fuller, greener, lusher.

Lyrics: E qui anc jorn d'amar si feis
Poetic Translation: And who to love once freely chose

Lyrics: Non taing q'era s'en desrazic
Poetic Translation: Ought not uproot from out its frame,

Lyrics: C'ab lo novel temps que s'espreis
Poetic Translation: Because, since Spring awoke and rose,

Lyrics: Deu quecs aver son cor plus ric;
Poetic Translation: His heart is now enriched with flame;

Lyrics: E qui non sap ab la lenga
Poetic Translation: He who wonders how to utter

Lyrics: Dir so queﾂｷil coven, aprenga
Poetic Translation: What he feels, let him discover

Lyrics: Consi ab novel joi s'esplec:
Poetic Translation: The way to win with spirits high:

Lyrics: C'aisi vol Pretz queﾂｷs captenga.
Poetic Translation: Worth says joy behooves a lover.

Lyrics: Estat ai fis amics adreis
Poetic Translation: I'm true and faithful, as she knows,

Lyrics: D'una queﾂｷm enganav'ab tric,
Poetic Translation: To her, a sly, deceitful dame,

Lyrics: E car anc s'amors mi destreis,
Poetic Translation: But since my feelings me enclose

Lyrics: Tos temps n'aurai mon cor enic;
Poetic Translation: In bonds, I'm angry just the same;

Lyrics: Qu'aras non voill qu'ab sa lenga
Poetic Translation: I don't want to hear her utter

Lyrics: Auir lo digz queﾂｷm destrenga
Poetic Translation: Words that bind and hold me under:

Lyrics: Per so qu'autre ab lieis s'abrec
Poetic Translation: The prize for which I hunt and sigh

Lyrics: Et eu caz so q'aicel prenga.
Poetic Translation: Has been captured by some other.

Lyrics: Ab leis remangaﾂｷl malaveis
Poetic Translation: But leave deceit and spite to those

Lyrics: Eﾂｷl engans et ab son amic;
Poetic Translation: Like her and him who me defame,

Lyrics: Que tals joys m'a pres e m'azeis
Poetic Translation: Since joy has sent such pleasant throes

Lyrics: Dont ja non creirai fals prezic:
Poetic Translation: It will not lead to any shame:

Lyrics: Anz voill c'om mi tail la lenga
Poetic Translation: I will die before I utter

Lyrics: S'ieu ja de leis crei lausenga
Poetic Translation: Slander, or such lies uncover;

Lyrics: Ni de s'amor mi desazec,
Poetic Translation: Nor would I ever love deny

Lyrics: S'ieﾂｷn sabia perdr'Aurenga.
Poetic Translation: Though Orange's loss I suffer.

Lyrics: Ben taing qu'eu sia fis vas leis
Poetic Translation: My scruples faithfulness impose,

Lyrics: Car anc mais tant en aut non cric.
Poetic Translation: So high a place is now my aim.

Lyrics: Que Nostre Seigner, el mezeis,
Poetic Translation: For even God, Who life bestows,

Lyrics: Ab pauc de far non i faillic;
Poetic Translation: Well-nigh displeased with her became,

Lyrics: C'apenas saup ab la lenga
Poetic Translation: For the Lord could barely utter,

Lyrics: Dir "aital vuoill que devenga";
Poetic Translation: "Let this form and fame become her":

Lyrics: Qu'a la beutat q'en leis assec
Poetic Translation: He wants no other woman's eye

Lyrics: Non volc c'autra s'i espenga.
Poetic Translation: Steeped in envy at this wonder.

Lyrics: Domna, noﾂｷus sai dir loncs plaideis,
Poetic Translation: No long petitions I compose,

Lyrics: Mas far de mi podetz mendic
Poetic Translation: But you can strip me bare and lame

Lyrics: O plus ric que anc no fon reis;
Poetic Translation: Or make me king where fortune flows.

Lyrics: Del tot sui en vostre castic!
Poetic Translation: I'm in your power, mild and tame!

Lyrics: Sol vos digatz ab la lenga
Poetic Translation: What you bid me, simply utter:

Lyrics: Consi voletz queﾂｷm captenga;
Poetic Translation: I your will would rediscover;

Lyrics: Qu'eu ai cor qu'enasi estec,
Poetic Translation: My heart I never could defy.

Lyrics: E que ja d'autra noﾂｷm fenga!
Poetic Translation: May I never love another.

Lyrics: Domna, noﾂｷus quier ab la lenga
Poetic Translation: Lady, no requests I utter

Lyrics: Mas qu'en baisan vos estrenga
Poetic Translation: But to hold you, gain your succor,

Lyrics: En tal luoc on ab vos m'azec,
Poetic Translation: And kiss you, and to be nearby,

Lyrics: E que d'ams mos bratz vos senga.
Poetic Translation: In my arms you to recover.

Lyrics: Levet, fai auzir ta lengua
Poetic Translation: Levet, own your voice, whose color

Lyrics: En cuy beutatz se depenga;
Poetic Translation: Must be pictured in the thunder;

Lyrics: C'aia tal vers selha qu'ieu dec
Poetic Translation: May this, her song, so finely fly,

Lyrics: Per so que de miﾂｷl sovenga.
Poetic Translation: She remember me, her lover.

Lyrics: Raimbaut d'Aurenga
Poetic Translation: Carol Anne Perry Lagemann
